title: Blame! Movie
synopsis: A young girl named Zuru sets out on an expedition through a post-apocalyptic city controlled by machines in a desperate hunt for food. Things go awry when her team accidently triggers the city's AI defense program called the Safeguard. Attacked by the machines, her companions are on the verge of being annihilated when a mysterious man named Killy arrives and exterminates the hostile units.
related_anime: ['Blame!', 'Blame!: Denki Ryoushi Kiken Kaisou Dasshutsu Sakusen']
voices: ['Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Hayami, Saori', 'Amamiya, Sora', 'Suzaki, Aya', 'Miyano, Mamoru', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Mori, Nanako', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Shimazaki, Nobunaga']
